attributes.action: make the last Monday of every January a UK Bank Holiday
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Scientific research has shown that the most depressing day of the year lands in the last week of January.
The general well-being and moral of the country is at an annual low around this time.
To cheer up the nation, the entire country should be given the day off in order to partake in activities that will re-affirm their inner desires AND inject a healthy dose of hedonism into an already over-worked population.
National Phone in Sick Day must become an official Bank Holday.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
